class.name: pcl/PassThrough
class.description: PassThrough is a filter that uses the basic Filter class mechanisms for passing data around.

class.name: pcl/VoxelGrid
class.description: VoxelGrid assembles a local 3D grid over a given PointCloud, and uses that to downsample the data.

class.name: pcl/ProjectInliers
class.description: ProjectInliers uses a model and a set of inlier indices from a PointCloud to project them into a separate PointCloud.

class.name: pcl/ExtractIndices
class.description: ExtractIndices extracts a set of indices from a PointCloud as a separate PointCloud.

class.name: pcl/StatisticalOutlierRemoval
class.description: StatisticalOutlierRemoval uses point neighborhood statistics to filter outlier data.

class.name: pcl/RadiusOutlierRemoval
class.description: RadiusOutlierRemoval uses point neighborhood statistics to filter outlier data.

class.name: pcl/CropBox
class.description: CropBox is a filter that allows the user to filter all the data inside of a given box.
